logic.generators.facades

Interface OrderFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderFacadeImpl

    public interface OrderFacade
    The logic-facade for any order-DAO operation, the data Layer and Presentation layer both goes through this layer when sending/recieving information, consider each layer closed This interface uses multiple DAO's for mysql, but an implementation could decide to only use one if desired
